title: Eating your heart out
creator_credit: Chris Warner, Maureen McCarthy and Trout Films
brief_description: A study of food, dieting and obsessional eating especially as they affect women and girls in Western societies. Examines a number of eating disorders such as anorexia nervosa, bulimia, obesity and the condition known as the fat thin woman as well as wider social pressures that lead to obsessions about eating. Narrated by Beverly Dunn, music by Mark McSherry, photographed by Jaems Grant.
